revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=Internet Radio |revision=3 (AIR3) |upc= |ean= |asin=B002E8HDOC;JP; |price= |est_release_date=12/25/2008 |fcc_date=11/07/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=internet radio |fcc_id=MSQAIR3 |ic_id=3568A-MSQAIR3 |us_id= |pwr_v=20 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=SE |cpu1_model=7009-CDG |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Senao NUB-3701 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2571WF |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2528 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8100C |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=VIA Vectro 2-port PCI USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6210L;;1;,,, Audio Class D Stereo Amplifier;Texas Instruments;TPA3120D2;;1; |flags=HDSS, IR remote, LCD display |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:23:54 }} {{TagLine|ASUS Internet Radio 3 (AIR3)}} :''Speakers for iPod with Internet Radio'' :• [http://www.asus.com/Internet_Radio/AIR3/ Product page] - ASUS AIR3 ([https://fccid.io/MSQ/AIR3 MSQAIR3]) :• [http://www.asus.com/Internet_Radio/AIR/ Product page] - ASUS AIR ([https://fccid.io/MSQ/AIR MSQAIR])
HDSS (High Definition Sound Standard) :ETL (Embedded Transmission Line)
WLAN Card: ''[[Senao]]'' NUB-3701 Module (ASUS) - 0.10 LPF :PN:5216A0195000
===Features=== :- Universal iPod Spaker with charger :- Video out from iPod touch and other iPod :- Aux In from other devices :- More than 10.000 internet worldwide radio stations :- 250 favorite radio stations :- Playing music from your PC through UPnP protocol :- Internet weather forecast and financial infromation :- Alarm Clock with Nap
===Specifications=== *Connectivity: Wireless LAN 802.11b/g, Wired 10/100M Ethernet *Data Rates: 54 Mbits (WLAN), 10 Mbits (Ethernet) *Wireless LAN Security: 64/128-bit WEP,WPA *Audio Format Decoder: MP3/WMA (16~320Kbps) *SNR: >90dB Earphone *Display: 128x64 FSTN Graphics Display (Blue color) *I/O Port: Headphone Jack (3.5mm), Line In (3.5mm), :S-Video / Composite Video Outs, Ethernet (RJ45) *Speaker: :2x 1" Silk Dome Tweeter 3W (5 Ohm) :2x 3.5" Woofer 15W (4 Ohm) *AC Power Adaptor: :Input: 100-240V (50-60Hz) 1.7A :Output: DC 20V/2A *Remote Control: IR (26 keys) *Dimension: 408mm x 170mm x 170mm (LxWxH) *Weight: 3.5kg (device only)
===Reviews=== *[http://vr-zone.com/articles/asus-air3-high-definition-speakers-for-ipod-with-internet-radio/6345.html ''ASUS AIR3 High Definition Speakers for iPod with Internet Radio'' on '''VR-Zone'''] *[http://www.engadget.com/2008/12/26/asus-officially-launches-ipod-friendly-air3-internet-radio/ ''ASUS officially launches iPod-friendly AIR3 internet radio'' on '''Engadget'''] *[http://www.overclockzone.com/tor_za/year_2009/04/asus_air3/ ''ASUS AIR3 - Asus Internet Radio'' on '''OverClockZone'''] *[http://itc.ua/news/air3_pervaya_zvukovaya_sistema_asus_s_sertifikatom_hdss_34985/ ''ASUS AIR3'' on '''ITC'''] (RU)
===See also=== *[[Aluratek Wi-Fi Internet Radio (AIRMM03F)]] • [https://www.exploitee.rs/index.php/Aluratek_WiFi_Radio​ Spec.] *[[ASUS Internet Radio (AIR)]] *[[ASUS Internet Radio 3 (AIR3)]] *[[Linksys WiFi Internet Radio (WML11B)]] *[[Logitech Squeezebox Radio]] *[[Logic3 Scuderia FS1 Air]] *[[Philips Fidelio SoundSphere (DS6800W)]]
